name: Choice Columns
description:
Tag radio or checkbox fields with the action tag @CHOICE-COLUMNS=? to specify the number of columns the choices will be displayed in.
Choices are placed into columns across-then-down for horizontal alignment, and down-then-across for vertical alignment.

action-tags.description:
Tag radio or checkbox fields with the action tag @CHOICE-COLUMNS=? to specify the number of columns the choices will be displayed in (1-99).
Choices are placed into columns across-then-down for horizontal alignment, and down-then-across for vertical alignment.
